raw_data.description: Bubble Tea Storefront in Downtown Kannapolis

reviews_data.review_text: This is a real gem in small downtown Kannapolis. Definitely a place I would take out of town family and friends. I regularly get the Taro milk tea, sometimes with bubbles, 25% sweet and it's perfect. I'll try their other flavors and seasonal drinks eventually.
Love going to the B&K in Kannapolis downtown. They offer great customer service and their drink are so good. My family enjoys getting bobba drink while taking a walk around the park.
Great tea! Nice place!
Super friendly staff and great teas!
I enjoyed visiting here. Great tea options that taste great.

I’ve frequented B&K’s other locations for 2 years and ALWAYS get the taro milk tea. This is my 3rd try with this location, and I’m probably just going to take the longer drive to Huntersville (best location IMO) or Mooresville. My order on 8/29 9:40pm was a very disappointing $10 “cheat” drink.
There was no real taro flavor-just purple oatmilk, boba, ice, and a hint of some type of  rose scented perfume/lotion. The employees are friendly and the boba has the best texture-akin to their brand. I’ve tried different times of day, I’ve tried delivery and I’ve walked in. The kids do like their fruit teas.
Absolutely love this place! Great tea and fast service.  Every time I'm in town I stop by. Highly recommend you check them out!
They always do a great job here!

My favorite bubble tea spot in Concord/north Charlotte area. No other bubble tea places compare. The quality of the tea is the best. Never had an issue and they always make it right. Tastes great, mixed well, and the bubba/lychee jelly is fantastic every time.

If you are in the area go here for bubble tea or any of their other locations like the one in Concord.
It’s a great spot to get a refreshing drink. There are lots of flavor options and the staff is always kind. If you’re ever in Kannapolis this is definitely a place I recommend you should check out.
Everyone is always super sweet and the tea is perfect every time
Great place for boba 🧋 my wife’s go to hence I wish for no more branches around concord!

Great little place tucked away in downtown Kannapolis. Their store has pretty reasonable priced tea and I haven't had one I dont like yet. Perfect for a hot summer day or to hang out with friends. Definitely will keep going.

Great little place tucked away in downtown Kannapolis. Their store has pretty reasonable priced tea and I haven't had one I dont like yet. Perfect for a hot summer day or to hang out with friends. Definitely will keep going.
I love it
Best boba place ever. Staff is friendly. Service is quick. And the boba is always hitting. 11/10

Honestly, I'm so frustrated with the whole experience. I've been going to this location for years, and today, it really annoyed me. Our 4 drinks were each missing some of the drink as if someone drank a big gulp.  They had got more people in while we were waiting for our drinks, so I decided not to ask n let it slide this time. I got a strawberry milk tea which has strawberry syrup in it, and i got strawberry poppers so when i got it and  saw the red, i thought my poppers were in there. Then I get home 22 mins away and see that my drink that I paid extra for boba did not have any boba. Not worth wasting gas  just to add the boba, but I'm very disappointed. I think ima stop going to this location.in the picture I didnt drink any too.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Kimberly, 

We are saddened to hear about your experience and we value your continuous support. Please email us at  info@bkteacafe.com so we can compensate you with free drinks to make up for this experience. 

- B&K Tea Cafe Management

reviews_data.review_text:
I went to BnK recently, and I have to say it’s an absolute gem! From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with a warm, and inviting atmosphere. The interior is clean and stylish.

Now, the drinks, the menu is impressively diverse, offering classic milk teas, fruit teas,  and even specialty seasonal drinks. I ordered the Tiger Milk Tea with boba and was blown away by the flavor. The tea was rich and smooth, with just the right amount of sweetness, and the tapioca pearls were perfectly chewy and fresh. You can tell they take pride in the quality of their ingredients and preparation.

The staff is another highlight, especially Andre’s, we have great conversation ever time I come in. They’re always friendly,, and knowledgeable about the menu. They even took the time to explain a few drink options.

If you’re in Kannapolis and love boba, or even if you’re just curious, this place is a must-visit. Five stars all the way!
Andres and Crystal are awesome me and my friends love coming to this location.
Andres & Crystal are always amazing. I’m here multiple times a week and the customer service they show is unmatched. Appreciate you guys!

Tried to give this place another chance but it just keeps getting worse. I tried to poke a hole in the drink for the straw and the entire cup shattered. Such a waste and disappointment. Workers were not helpful at all they saw it happen.
Boba 😛
Great drinks and great employees
Pleasant and smiling faces every visit!!

i love getting boba here but the customer service isnt the best. i come here from time to time, and i somehow always come when this specific rude worker is on register. he seems to appear as a teenager with tan skin and black glasses. no “hi how are you,” or anything. just an annoyed stare. it makes me not want to order from here again.
I got the strawberry sunrise and my wife got some lavender drink. Both were very good.

Had a great experience with B&K catering services for my daughter’s graduation party. The boba and the tea were fresh, they provided the cups and straws too. Guess we’re delighted with the drinks, including the adults. ❤️
I have NEVER had a bad drink from here. I love that you can order online and pick up at the little pickup window. It is definitely a little gem that we are very lucky to have downtown.
We love the boba from here! We go anytime we are in Kannapolis
Always excellent service and the best boba teas we have ever had. We will always go to B&K!! Thank you! 💞
I am a frequent flyer at B&K. Their milk teas and boba are delicious. Their fruit teas and toppings are so refreshing. I am here probably once a week and will gladly give them all of my money!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you Whitney! We are grateful for your continued support.

This is a common date night spot for us but after the fourth time with no customer service or kindness, we’ll be skipping it from here on out. The young tan boy that frequently works there and typically has a black t shirt with a large red graphic on the back has ruined our experience every time. Tonight he spoke down to me while ordering and handed me a drink with a busted bottom. When we pointed it out, he took the drink, put another cup underneath it, slammed it down on the counter and rudely said “have a good night.” We work in customer service and are very particular to be kind to people who do the same. I don’t know what we’ve done to be treated so rudely every time.
Ordered from here a few times. The drinks are always good and the staff are always friendly. It’s a little on the pricey side though.

The boba was good but the customer service was SO BAD! Miguel B was super rude and rolling his eyes when we would ask questions about the bobas (since we don't get Boba often and wanted to try something new) and constantly shaking his head while we were trying to decide what drink to get and spoke with A LOT of attitude. I understand it's getting near the end of closing when we came around 9:30PM but that doesn't excuse you from treating us like garbage. So sad that good places like this hire such impatient rude people like him! Makes me not want to come get a drink from here again.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Alexandra,

We are so sorry to hear about your negative experience at B&K Tea Cafe. We pride ourselves in our customer service, so we will take this issue very seriously.

We do not have an employee with the name of “Miguel,” but we will investigate this issue further and address this to our staff.

If you can email us at info@bkteacafe.com with your phone number and more information about your order, then we would be more than happy to offer you free drinks the next time you visit. 

Thank you,
Kristen | Co-Founder

Never not loved B&K’s boba. The service is fast and employees always seem to work together. Atmosphere is sometimes off, but always worth it for the boba. Love!

B&K Tea Cafe, was a great addition to Downtown Kannapolis, especially if you like boba tea, I like the milk teas and fruit teas, my favorites are the Tiger Milk Tea, Peachy Lychee and Mango Madness Fruit Teas. There are more that I like because I’m trying to go through the menu and try them all. The staff are really friendly and fast at fixing your order, never had to wait a long time. This location is really clean. I highly recommend trying them out.
Amazing staff. The teas are amazing

If you're searching for a boba haven in Kannapolis, look no further - I've found the perfect spot! This delightful establishment has won me over with their friendly staff, drink-making skills, and their attention to cute details that make each visit a memorable experience.

Speaking of the drinks, let me just say - they are out of this world! Every sip is a burst of heavenly flavors. I'm amazed at how they consistently deliver my favorite concoctions with perfect consistency and taste. One of my fruity favorites is the Pineapple Passionfruit with strawberry poppers and crystal boba, a refreshing blend that truly hits the spot. And when it comes to creamy goodness, the tiger milk tea and strawberry milk tea with strawberry poppers steal my heart every time.

But what sets this boba spot apart is their creative flair. The staff's ingenuity shines through with the cutest signs showcasing their personal favorite drinks, movie-inspired creations, and nostalgic anime-themed beverages. Seeing their recent Studio Ghibli themed drinks pretty much solidified my love for this location. It's evident that they put thought and care into creating a menu that appeals to all tastes and interests.

And let's not forget about the extra bit of joy they bring by offering Pokémon, Sanrio, and other stickers for sale. It's those little touches that make the experience even more delightful. Although it's not Asian-owned, their dedication to providing a delicious and enjoyable boba experience is commendable.

Overall, I wholeheartedly recommend this boba spot in Kannapolis. The friendly staff, expertly crafted drinks, and charming details make it a must-visit for any boba lover.

reviews_data.review_text: My first experience of bubble tea was at B&K in Kannapolis. I’m now an addict 😂 Great flavours and fast, friendly service. Get the reusable cup to save a bit of cash on each purchase. Next I’m getting a plushie 💕
my fav boba spot!!!

Great tea, but sanitation is sub par. No one is wearing gloves… I probably won’t go back again just because the sanitation with making drinks and serving them isn’t appropriate. I even had one girl smell the flavoring to make sure it was the right one before she poured it into my drink… drinks and service is good, just not sanitation.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Dakota, 

I am glad you enjoyed the drinks! In relation to sanitation, it is not required by the North Carolina Department of Agriculture that Cafes/Coffee Shops/Bubble Tea Shops wear gloves when preparing drinks in single use containers. I sincerely apologize for way the employee deciphered what drink was what and that is not our protocol (We will notify our staff immediately to not do that). I hope you choose to visit again, thanks!

reviews_data.review_text: Great place. The tea is delicious!
Love this place and the owner, vibes are great <3
Great little shop and a great selection of beverages!

RUN to B&K for all your boba needs! The fruit teas are my favorite when I need an afternoon pick me up, they are super light and refreshing! The milk teas satisfy my sweet cravings and the perfect place to stop after dinner! The quality of the tea is 10/10 and the tapioca pearls are chewy and bouncy (my preferred texture). B&K is the perfect addition to the kannapolis area, I’m so glad they have added diverse and fun drinks to our small town! The employees are all so cute & trendy and I love watching their weekly tik tok videos!

WOW is all I can say about this tea cafe. The flavors are exceptional and the quality is top-notch. What sets them apart is the story behind it. Two young adults who shared a passion for boba tea brought this Asian delicacy to Concord and Kannapolis. Their concept of easy-to-order drinks is a first. The team at B&K makes it easy for customers to understand, decide, and order without the complications of a foreign menu. Their exceptional recipe and easy ordering process make for an unforgettable B&K experience. Whether you're a boba connoisseur or a first-timer, you can't go wrong with a refreshing tea from B&K!
I love this boba place so much everyone that works there is so friendly.

reviews_data.review_text: This is the best boba spot in the surrounding Charlotte area. I’ve tried all the boba in Charlotte and this is the best place, I highly recommend. I love the strawberry sunrise with boba and strawberry poppers. The staff are so patient and helpful if you are new to boba. 🧋❤️

We love this cafe!!!  My 9year old daughter asks to go here all the time!  The employees are all very friendly and helpful!  I want to thank you for having a decaf option!  I can’t have caffeine and love the decaf mango madness! My daughters favorite is the milk tea.

I tasted a drink this time I wasn’t a fan of at all but when I went in and talked to them about it they remade me something I did like same size and price and we were all good. I really value places that don’t make me feel bad about when I have issue with tastes and textures. Thanks girlies at bk. You really made my day and I will definitely be coming back all the time ❤️🙌🤗

This is a great local boba shop! B&K have a large variety of options, and the tea is the real deal - the fruit teas are refreshing and have real fruit in them, and the milk teas are very flavorful. You can adjust sweetness as well if you don’t want your drink as sweet (I got the wintermelon milk tea with 50% sugar +lychee jelly and it was perfect). The employees (and founders!) are hardworking, super welcoming and friendly too. Definitely stop by if you’re in Kannapolis 🧋

reviews_data.review_text: This is a real gem in small downtown Kannapolis. Definitely a place I would take out of town family and friends. I regularly get the Taro milk tea, sometimes with bubbles, 25% sweet and it's perfect. I'll try their other flavors and seasonal drinks eventually.

I’ve frequented B&K’s other locations for 2 years and ALWAYS get the taro milk tea. This is my 3rd try with this location, and I’m probably just going to take the longer drive to Huntersville (best location IMO) or Mooresville. My order on 8/29 9:40pm was a very disappointing $10 “cheat” drink.
There was no real taro flavor-just purple oatmilk, boba, ice, and a hint of some type of  rose scented perfume/lotion. The employees are friendly and the boba has the best texture-akin to their brand. I’ve tried different times of day, I’ve tried delivery and I’ve walked in. The kids do like their fruit teas.

reviews_data.review_text:
I went to BnK recently, and I have to say it’s an absolute gem! From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with a warm, and inviting atmosphere. The interior is clean and stylish.

Now, the drinks, the menu is impressively diverse, offering classic milk teas, fruit teas,  and even specialty seasonal drinks. I ordered the Tiger Milk Tea with boba and was blown away by the flavor. The tea was rich and smooth, with just the right amount of sweetness, and the tapioca pearls were perfectly chewy and fresh. You can tell they take pride in the quality of their ingredients and preparation.

The staff is another highlight, especially Andre’s, we have great conversation ever time I come in. They’re always friendly,, and knowledgeable about the menu. They even took the time to explain a few drink options.

If you’re in Kannapolis and love boba, or even if you’re just curious, this place is a must-visit. Five stars all the way!
Andres and Crystal are awesome me and my friends love coming to this location.

B&K Tea Cafe, was a great addition to Downtown Kannapolis, especially if you like boba tea, I like the milk teas and fruit teas, my favorites are the Tiger Milk Tea, Peachy Lychee and Mango Madness Fruit Teas. There are more that I like because I’m trying to go through the menu and try them all. The staff are really friendly and fast at fixing your order, never had to wait a long time. Amazing staff. The teas are amazing

If you're searching for a boba haven in Kannapolis, look no further - I've found the perfect spot! This delightful establishment has won me over with their friendly staff, drink-making skills, and their attention to cute details that make each visit a memorable experience.

Speaking of the drinks, let me just say - they are out of this world! Every sip is a burst of heavenly flavors. I'm amazed at how they consistently deliver my favorite concoctions with perfect consistency and taste. One of my fruity favorites is the Pineapple Passionfruit with strawberry poppers and crystal boba, a refreshing blend that truly hits the spot. And when it comes to creamy goodness, the tiger milk tea and strawberry milk tea with strawberry poppers steal my heart every time.

But what sets this boba spot apart is their creative flair. The staff's ingenuity shines through with the cutest signs showcasing their personal favorite drinks, movie-inspired creations, and nostalgic anime-themed beverages. Seeing their recent Studio Ghibli themed drinks pretty much solidified my love for this location. It's evident that they put thought and care into creating a menu that appeals to all tastes and interests.

And let's not forget about the extra bit of joy they bring by offering Pokémon, Sanrio, and other stickers for sale. It's those little touches that make the experience even more delightful. Although it's not Asian-owned, their dedication to providing a delicious and enjoyable boba experience is commendable.

Overall, I wholeheartedly recommend this boba spot in Kannapolis. The friendly staff, expertly crafted drinks, and charming details make it a must-visit for any boba lover.

reviews_data.review_text: My first experience of bubble tea was at B&K in Kannapolis. I’m now an addict 😂 Great flavours and fast, friendly service. Get the reusable cup to save a bit of cash on each purchase. Next I’m getting a plushie 💕
my fav boba spot!!!

Great tea, but sanitation is sub par. No one is wearing gloves… I probably won’t go back again just because the sanitation with making drinks and serving them isn’t appropriate. I even had one girl smell the flavoring to make sure it was the right one before she poured it into my drink… drinks and service is good, just not sanitation.
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Dakota, 

I am glad you enjoyed the drinks! In relation to sanitation, it is not required by the North Carolina Department of Agriculture that Cafes/Coffee Shops/Bubble Tea Shops wear gloves when preparing drinks in single use containers. I sincerely apologize for way the employee deciphered what drink was what and that is not our protocol (We will notify our staff immediately to not do that). I hope you choose to visit again, thanks!

RUN to B&K for all your boba needs! The fruit teas are my favorite when I need an afternoon pick me up, they are super light and refreshing! The milk teas satisfy my sweet cravings and the perfect place to stop after dinner! The quality of the tea is 10/10 and the tapioca pearls are chewy and bouncy (my preferred texture). B&K is the perfect addition to the kannapolis area, I’m so glad they have added diverse and fun drinks to our small town! WOW is all I can say about this tea cafe. The flavors are exceptional and the quality is top-notch. What sets them apart is the story behind it. Two young adults who shared a passion for boba tea brought this Asian delicacy to Concord and Kannapolis. Their concept of easy-to-order drinks is a first. The team at B&K makes it easy for customers to understand, decide, and order without the complications of a foreign menu. Their exceptional recipe and easy ordering process make for an unforgettable B&K experience. Whether you're a boba connoisseur or a first-timer, you can't go wrong with a refreshing tea from B&K!

reviews_data.review_text: This is the best boba spot in the surrounding Charlotte area. I’ve tried all the boba in Charlotte and this is the best place, I highly recommend. This is a great local boba shop! B&K have a large variety of options, and the tea is the real deal - the fruit teas are refreshing and have real fruit in them, and the milk teas are very flavorful. The employees (and founders!) are hardworking, super welcoming and friendly too. Definitely stop by if you’re in Kannapolis 🧋
